name: Walden Horde
description:
War


Make rapid combos against your enemies with one-handed weapons, Strike great blows to the king’s guard with two-handed weapons, Don't even give them a chance to recover with your wizardry skills, Silently destroy your enemies with ejection.

Diplomacy


Engage in dialogues with the characters and manage your relationships wisely! Improve your diplomacy skill to win battles without using a sword.

Discover Fantasy/Medieval World


Stroll around taverns in the city and village, fight duels, engage in dialogues. Initiate intrigues in the palace of the great king. Follow the whispers in the forest and take your revenge!

Experience the Story


Live medieval fantasy to the fullest by shaping the story with your choices and actions in this content where revenge, war, and politics are intertwined!
